name: beam
0:
”Alexa, ask beam Home to close my door”
”Alexa, ask beam Home to open my door”
”Alexa, ask beam Home if my door is open”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beam home
Developer Terms of Use
des:
beam is the simple and secure way to control and monitor your garage door from anywhere in the world, without replacing your existing garage door opener. The app uses industry-standard security technology to keep your data—and access to your garage—safe and secure. 

With beam, you can:
- Control one garage door with a Smart Control Kit installed*
- Customize your door name 
- Receive notifications if you’ve left your door open
- Grant access to your friends and family—no need to buy extra remotes!
- Monitor your door’s activity
- Setup integrations with other smarthome products and services such as Amazon Echo and IFTTT

*The beam app requires the purchase and installation of a Smart Control Kit, which is compatible with garage door openers made after 1993 with a photo-eye safety system, with sectional doors. Learn more at beamlabs.io.
